thread.title: Cubs hit 6 home runs, top Cardinals 8-6 for 2-1 lead in NLDS
thread.title_full: Cubs hit 6 home runs, top Cardinals 8-6 for 2-1 lead in NLDS

title: Cubs hit 6 home runs, top Cardinals 8-6 for 2-1 lead in NLDS
text:
> Sports Cubs hit 6 home runs, top Cardinals 8-6 for 2-1 lead in NLDS Chicago Cubs fans cheer after Game 3 in baseball's National League Division Series, Monday, Oct. 12, 2015, in Chicago. The Cubs won 8-6. (AP Photo/Nam Y. Huh)
